description: This source file defines Pydantic models for driver-related data schemas in a ride-sharing backend, including driver profile updates, availability, location, public data, and query parameters.

classes.name: DriverProfileUpsert
classes.description: Schema for inserting or updating driver profile information such as vehicle details and license number.

classes.name: DriverAvailabilityUpdate
classes.description: Schema to update the driver's availability status.

classes.name: DriverLocationUpdate
classes.description: Schema for updating driver location with latitude and longitude.

classes.name: DriverPublic
classes.description: Public representation of driver data including location, rating, and status.

classes.name: AvailableDriversQuery
classes.description: Schema for internal use to specify query parameters for locating nearby available drivers.

ctags.name: AvailableDriversQuery
ctags.pattern: /^class AvailableDriversQuery(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: DriverAvailabilityUpdate
ctags.pattern: /^class DriverAvailabilityUpdate(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: DriverLocationUpdate
ctags.pattern: /^class DriverLocationUpdate(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: DriverProfileUpsert
ctags.pattern: /^class DriverProfileUpsert(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: DriverPublic
ctags.pattern: /^class DriverPublic(BaseModel):$/

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: UUID = Field(..., description="Driver user id (same as users.id).")$/

ctags.name: is_available
ctags.pattern: /^    is_available: bool = Field(..., description="Current availability status.")$/

ctags.name: is_available
ctags.pattern: /^    is_available: bool = Field(..., description="Whether driver is currently available for match/

ctags.name: lat
ctags.pattern: /^    lat: Optional[float] = Field(default=None, ge=-90, le=90, description="Filter center latitud/

ctags.name: lat
ctags.pattern: /^    lat: float = Field(..., ge=-90, le=90, description="Latitude in degrees.")$/

ctags.name: license_no
ctags.pattern: /^    license_no: Optional[str] = Field($/

ctags.name: license_no
ctags.pattern: /^    license_no: Optional[str] = Field(default=None, description="License number (may be null).")$/

ctags.name: lng
ctags.pattern: /^    lng: Optional[float] = Field(default=None, ge=-180, le=180, description="Filter center longi/

ctags.name: lng
ctags.pattern: /^    lng: float = Field(..., ge=-180, le=180, description="Longitude in degrees.")$/

ctags.name: location_lat
ctags.pattern: /^    location_lat: Optional[float] = Field(default=None, description="Last known latitude.")$/

ctags.name: location_lng
ctags.pattern: /^    location_lng: Optional[float] = Field(default=None, description="Last known longitude.")$/

ctags.name: radius_km
ctags.pattern: /^    radius_km: Optional[float] = Field($/

ctags.name: rating
ctags.pattern: /^    rating: float = Field(..., description="Driver rating placeholder.")$/

ctags.name: updated_at
ctags.pattern: /^    updated_at: datetime = Field(..., description="When driver record was last updated.")$/

ctags.name: vehicle_info
ctags.pattern: /^    vehicle_info: Optional[str] = Field($/

ctags.name: vehicle_info
ctags.pattern: /^    vehicle_info: Optional[str] = Field(default=None, description="Vehicle description.")$/
